sentence: And the service in the dining room was also top notch we hosted my grandmothers birthday there and the wait staff was amazing
Matthew with in room dining went above and beyond to make sure my stay was memorable
The room was very comfortable
The room is well appointed with an espresso coffee machine honor bar in room air filtration system yoga mat and meditation disc that is a new one as well as books to read
This is a nice hotel in a nice area the room on the 9th floor was particularly lovely traditional decor
We stay at this Ritz Carlton every year and this was the first time we stayed here after Christmas and we got a good package rate in an Executive Suite which was very roomy

Also The last 3 times I have stayed at the Ritz we had in our room a blue Ritz Carlton cooler small one and a blue logo Ritz Carlton drawstring bag and a blue Ritz Carlton zip bag these come in handy and we still use them to this day
The bathroom was good the beds were comfy I could hear nothing as I was going to bed
Awesome service wonderful room with a great view
the staff are exceptional the hotel provided afternoon activities like free icecream and whiskey tastingthe air conditioning was not as cool as we would have liked in the room
If you do not feel like going out the menu for in room dining is absolutely delicious
The room felt more like a best western
2 mini size cups for espresso only supplied

in took nearly 30 minutes room smelled of smoke found ashes on the floor food and a nail grooming tolRom was extremely dirty especially the carpet we were moved to a clean room but still seemed outdatedvalet parking is 40 por customer service issues were n’t handled promptlythere is one elevator that will not allow access to certain floors even with the card heard many people complain about thisWe have stayed here several years when it was the Ritz and the customer service was always incredible
I had kept up with the in room charges that we accrued during our stay and I presented that information to the front desk lady so she could settle my charges and refund the difference in cash
Upon checking the concierge clerk Will gave us a nice room however he was so nice that I believe that even if he had put us in the basement we could not have been happier
The bellman was sent to move our bags out of our room around 4 pm
I was told the room was not cleaned yet and it would be ready by around 645pm
There is a fee for alcoholic beverages if you use the club room
There is no coffee in the room but there is free coffee in the lobby
